header.title: Passkey Sample
header.toast_logout_fail: Fail to logout. It may cause by internal server error.

login.title: Login with your account
login.error_invalid_credentials: Fail to login. check your email or password.
login.error_invalid_passkey: Fail to login. check your passkey.
login.toast_not_support_passkey: This browser does not support the Passkey feature.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.description_name: Name can modify after sign up.
signup.description_email: Email is required for login. and can't duplicate.
signup.invalid_email_message: Please enter a valid email address.
signup.description_password: Password must be at least 8 characters.
signup.description_password_confirm: Password must be same as above.
signup.input_checkbox_use_gravatar: Use Gravatar to link profile image.
signup.description_use_gravatar:
Based on the email you entered, Imports and synchronizes the profile image from Gravatar.
You can change this setting after sign up, and can also upload a profile picture for this system only.
signup.toast_remind_check_email: Before you sign up, please check your email validatily.
signup.toast_email_duplicate: This email is already in use.
signup.toast_email_check_cancel: Email check has been canceled. You can input new email address.
signup.toast_signup_success: Sign up success. Please log in with your account.
signup.toast_signup_fail_with_duplicate_email: Fail to sign up. It may cause by duplicated email.
signup.toast_signup_fail_with_invalid_password: Fail to sign up. It may cause by invalid password.
signup.toast_signup_fail: Fail to sign up. It may cause by internal server error.

profile.toast_fail_to_get_profile: Fail to get profile. It may cause by internal server error.

manage_passkey.title: Manage Passkey
manage_passkey.description: Passkey is a feature that allows you to log in without a password. You can use it to log in quickly and securely.
manage_passkey.toast_fail_to_register_passkey: Fail to register passkeys. It may cause by internal server error.
manage_passkey.toast_fail_to_register_passkey_duplicate: You tried to register a duplicate passkey. Please check the authenticator.
manage_passkey.toast_fail_to_register_passkey_user_canc: The registration process has been canceled by the user.
manage_passkey.toast_success_to_update_passkey: Passkey name has been updated successfully.
manage_passkey.toast_fail_to_delete_passkey: Fail to delete passkey. It may cause by internal server error.
manage_passkey.description_passkey_list: You can manage your passkey list. You can delete or modify label the passkey you want to delete.
manage_passkey.description_no_passkey: It seems to be no passkey registered. Please register a new passkey.
manage_passkey.hint_modify_passkey: You can modify the passkey name by double clicking the name.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.step_1_description: Input your current password to verify your account.
change_password.step_1_toast_fail_to_verify_password: Fail to verify your password. Please check your current password.
change_password.step_2_description: Input your new password to change your password in 10 minutes.
change_password.step_2_input_placeholder_new_password_co: Enter your new password once more
change_password.step_2_toast_fail_to_change_password: Fail to change your password. Please check your new password.
change_password.step_2_toast_not_match_password: New password and confirm password are not matched.
change_password.step_2_warning_message: Even if the password is changed, existing devices do not get logged out.

edit_profile.title: Edit Profile
edit_profile.description: You can edit your profile information. If you want to change your password, please go to the password change page.
edit_profile.description_on_error: There is an error in fetching the profile. Please try again later.
edit_profile.description_profile_image_from_gravatar: This profile image is loaded from Gravatar.
edit_profile.description_use_gravatar: If a profile image is set, this setting will be automatically disabled. If you wish to use Gravatar, please delete the existing profile image.
edit_profile.warn_duplicate_profile_settings: If you enable this option while having a profile picture, the set profile picture will be deleted.
edit_profile.toast_fail_to_fetch_profile: Fail to fetch profile. It may cause by internal server error.
edit_profile.toast_email_check_not_run: Please check your email address before modifying.
edit_profile.toast_fail_to_update_profile: Fail to update profile. It may cause by internal server error.
edit_profile.toast_image_size_exceed: The image size is too large. Please upload an image smaller than {{size}}MB.
